titleStmt.title: A letter to a person of quality, concerning the fines received by the church at its restoration, wherein, by the instance of one of the richest cathedrals a very fair guess may be made at the receipts and disbursements of all the rest. By a prebend of the Church of Canterbury
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.
